StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [CheckIfDupDesignatorExist]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Pro.leId uniqueiden..er, @Designator int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED declare @orgId int declare @schoolYr int declare @Sector varchar(2)
SELECT @orgId = hs.Organiza.on_ID, @schoolYr = hsp.School_Year, @sector = SectorDesignator from MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp inner join MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL hs on hs.School_Code = hsp.School_Code and hsp.rowguid = @Pro.leId inner join RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip mz on mz.Zip = le.(hs.Zip_Code,5) inner join RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms on ms.SectorId = mz.SectorId INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on AS ro ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = ro.rowguid and ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = hs.ORGANIZATION_ID
-- print @orgId -- print @schoolYr -- print @Sector
if exists(SELECT hsp.rowguid dupCount from MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp inner join MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL hs on hs.School_Code = hsp.School_Code and hsp.School_Year = @schoolYr inner join RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip mz on mz.Zip = le.(hs.Zip_Code,5) inner join RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms on ms.SectorId = mz.SectorId INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on AS ro ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = ro.rowguid and ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = hs.ORGANIZATION_ID and SectorDesignator=@Sector and hs.ORGANIZATION_ID = @orgId and hsp.Designator = @Designator and hsp.rowguid <> @Pro.leId) select 1 else select 0
END
